review: The only reason I bought the Amazon Fire TV was because I saw that it had the NBA Game Time app. I have subscribed to the League Pass for years and I was hoping this was my gateway to the games. I was wrong. It only shows clips and stats. My problem with this was that the logo for the NBA League pass advertised was the wrong one. Anyways. Other than that, this little box is the real deal. Its powerful and I can watch a lot of channels online with my provider subscription..I hope one day they will bring the NBA Game Time for watching full games for League pass subscribers..That would be awesome
